rows.label: bf03110100_0010
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: bf03110100_0020
rows.name:
So you headed to the World Tree to reach
Eden, but got swallowed up whole instead?

rows.label: bf03110100_0030
rows.name: That's quite the misfortune.

rows.label: bf03110100_0040
rows.name:
Vandham-san, what were you doing 
in a place like that?

rows.label: bf03110100_0050
rows.name:
You see, this Divine Beast regularly 
swallows things from outside.

rows.label: bf03110100_0060
rows.name:
I went to check if any useful supplies 
had washed up for the village.

rows.label: bf03110100_0070
rows.name: And that's when I ran into you folks.

rows.label: bf03110100_0080
rows.name: I see, so that's how it was.

rows.label: bf03110100_0090
rows.name:
We're here.
This is our village, Hr√¶svelgr.

rows.label: bf03110100_0100
rows.name:
There sure are a lot of 
children in this village.

rows.label: bf03110100_0110
rows.name: Lots of Drivers and Blades here too!

rows.label: bf03110100_0120
rows.name:
From here, we dispatch Drivers and Blades 
to various parts of the world.

rows.label: bf03110100_0130
rows.name:
The children are war orphans we took 
in during those missions.

rows.label: bf03110100_0140
rows.name:
So you take in children who 
have nowhere else to go.

rows.label: bf03110100_0150
rows.name: Just until they're grown...

rows.label: bf03110100_0160
rows.name: Some become Drivers,

rows.label: bf03110100_0170
rows.name: others become tailors.

rows.label: bf03110100_0180
rows.name: What they do with their lives is up to them.

rows.label: bf03110100_0190
rows.name:
Well, that's what we 
"Righteous Mercenaries" are about.

rows.label: bf03110100_0200
rows.name: You're quite the philanthropist...

rows.label: bf03110100_0210
rows.name:
You could say that.
I don't mind that.

rows.label: bf03110100_0220
rows.name:
But I'm getting hungry.
Let's grab something to eat soon.
